Pathfinder Worker:
You may enter the following Rim Kamalokas. You will not be allowed to re-enter until you have recovered, no matter which one you enter. Keep that in mind!
(You can only enter Rim Kamaloka once a day; 1000 PC Cafe points are required.)
Enter Rim Kamaloka (Levels 30-40)
Enter Rim Kamaloka (Levels 35-45)
Enter Rim Kamaloka (Levels 40-50)
